description: This table holds information about individual lines in a referral classifier rules table.

columns.name: TABLE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the table record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REQ_CLASSIFIER_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID for the classifier required associated with this line of the referral classifier rules.

columns.name: NETWORK_LEVELS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The network status associated with this line of the referral classifier rules.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


In


Out


Out of Area


N/A

columns.name: AVAIL_CLASSIFIER_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID for the classifier available associated with this line of the referral classifier rules.

columns.name: USE_UC_FEE_SCHED_YN
columns.description:
Set to "Y" if the Usual and Customary Fee Schedule is used for this line of the referral classifier rules. Otherwise, set to "N".


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PROV_PNLTY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The penalty associated with this line of the referral classifier rules.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Before Benefits Apply


After Benefits Apply

columns.name: EOB_CODE_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID for the EOB code associated with this line of the referral classifier rules.
